title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: LTC Surges 15.5% as Index Trades Higher From Friday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Aptos (APT) joined Litecoin (LTC) as a top performer, gaining 9% over the weekend.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3223.5, up 2.8% (+89.04) since 4 p.m ET on Friday.

Nineteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: LTC (+15.5%) and APT (+9.0%).

Laggards: XLM (-3.0%) and ADA (+0.5%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 index is up 2.8% with 19 of 20 assets trading higher, led by LTC's 15.5% surge and APT's 9% gain.
